document.full_text: former world number two sergio garcia took a step toward ending his trophy drought with a flawless 66 for a six-under-par opening round that left him two shots off the lead at the china open on thursday.
document.title: flawless garcia in the hunt at china open
lines_and_colors: former world number two sergio garcia took a step toward ending his trophy drought with a flawless 66 for a six-under-par opening round that left him two shots off the lead at the china open on thursday.
